channel.title: Questions
channel.description:
Question 1:How i make d bow k bow and mage bow to hit from far. Not run up to hit. Question 2:How i make d bow and k bow to train range not attack str or defence. Question 3:How do i make a weapon wield like a obby maul for example. Question 4:How do i add skillcape emotes. Question 5:How do i change the when u barrage it waits like 10 seconds to barrage again. How i change it to like 4 seconds?
Plz post, I want my server to kick ASS! :D

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

  1. parseIncomingPackets() or something similar - change it from a ‘melee’-type weapon to a ‘ranged’-type weapon somewhere(?)

  2. Relates to #1 - its ‘seeing it as a melee type weapon’

  3. Add the weapon to your arrays in the item.java class - otherwise it should work fine if you’re using the right one (I remember problems with the obby maul, try all of the IDs)

  4. Find the item id of the cape and in the switch statement have something along the lines of stillgfx(GFXID, XCOORD, YCOORD);

  5. Take off the timer that was crammed into boolean process() in the client.java class

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Question 5:How do i change the when u barrage it waits like 10 seconds to barrage again. How i change it to like 4 seconds?

Thread.sleep(10000); to wait 10 seconds, and Thread.sleep(4000); to wait 4 seconds. The sleep method of the Thread class in the Java API uses milliseconds for it’s time parameter. 1000 milliseconds = 1 second. Too tired to answer the other questions, it’s 11 PM here. Doubt anyone will answer the other questions anyways.

Read full topic
